SELECT SUM(today_net_amount) AS today_net_amount, SUM(today_loan_amount) AS today_loan_amount, SUM(today_month_amount) AS today_month_amount, SUM(v_amount) AS v_amount, AVG(v_rate) AS v_rate, SUM(today_day_amount) AS today_day_amount FROM (select SUM(case when BORROWTYPE = 3 then ACCOUNT end) today_net_amount, SUM(case when BORROWTYPE in (1,2,5) then ACCOUNT end) today_loan_amount, SUM(case when style in (1,2,3) then ACCOUNT end) today_month_amount, SUM(ACCOUNT) v_amount, AVG(apr) v_rate, SUM(case when style = 4 then ACCOUNT end) today_day_amount from rocky_borrow where BORROWTYPE in (1,2,3,5) and status >= 3 and success_time >= #{beginTime} and success_time <= #{endTime} UNION ALL
SELECT SUM(case when BORROW_TYPE = 3 then ACCOUNT_REAL end) today_net_amount, SUM(case when BORROW_TYPE in (1,2,5) then ACCOUNT_REAL end) today_loan_amount, SUM(case when BORROW_STYLE in (1,2,3) then ACCOUNT_REAL end) today_month_amount, SUM(ACCOUNT_REAL) v_amount, AVG(BORROW_APR) v_rate, SUM(case when BORROW_STYLE = 4 then ACCOUNT_REAL end) today_day_amount FROM rocky_b_transfer WHERE STATUS IN (3,4) and SUCCESS_TIME >= #{beginTime} and SUCCESS_TIME <= #{endTime} ) AS TB

mapper.select: SELECT m.id id,m.id user_id, m.USERNAME username, a.IDCARDNO idcard, r2.overdue_count overdue_count, r2.overdue_period overdue_period, r1.payment_count payment_count, r1.payment_period payment_period, r1.payment_total payment_total, yr.YESACCOUNT repay_amount FROM rocky_member m LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID,count(DISTINCT BORROW_ID) payment_count,count(*) payment_period, SUM(REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT) payment_total FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord WHERE WEBSTATUS = 1 GROUP BY user_id) r1 ON (m.id = r1.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID,SUM(REPAYMENT_YESACCOUNT) YESACCOUNT FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord WHERE `STATUS` = 1 GROUP BY USER_ID) yr on(m.id = yr.USER_ID) ,rocky_realname_appro a ,(SELECT r.USER_ID,count(DISTINCT BORROW_ID) overdue_count,count(*) overdue_period FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE (r.`STATUS` = 0 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME) FROM 1 FOR 10)) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTR(NOW() FROM 1 FOR 10))) or (r.status = 1 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME) FROM 1 FOR 10)) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(SUBSTR(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME) FROM 1 FOR 10))) GROUP BY r.user_id) r2 WHERE m.id = r2.user_id and a.user_id = m.id
